iati-activity.title: Enhancing Climate Resilience of Rural Communities Living in Protected Areas of Cambodia
iati-activity.description: To enhance the climate change resilience of communities living around five Cambodian PA intervention sites, as well as downstream communities, to the climate change-induced hazard of erratic rainfall.

location.name: Chiork Beungprey (Beung Per WS); Ronouk Khgeng (Phnom Prech WS); Chom Thlork (Beung Per WS); Skor Mreach (Beung Per WS); Chop Tasok (Phnom Kulen NP)

iati-activity.title: Reducing Risk and Vulnerability to Climate Change in the Region of La Depresion Momposina in Colombia
iati-activity.description: Reduce vulnerability of communities and of wetlands in the region of La Depresion Momposina to flooding and drought risks associated with climate change and variability.

location.name: Municipalities of Ayapel, San Marcos, and San Benito Abad

iati-activity.title: Developing Agro-Pastoral Shade Gardens as an Adaptation Strategy for Poor Rural Communities
iati-activity.description: To diversify and promote climate resilient agro-pastoral practices in rural Djibouti.

location.name: district of Ali Sabieh, plains of Petit Bara and Grand Bara

iati-activity.title: Building Resilient Food Security Systems to Benefit the Southern Egypt Region
iati-activity.description: To build resilience of Southern Egypt farming communities in the face of climate change and variability risks to food security.

location.name: Aswan, Luxor, Qena, Sohag, Assuit governorates

iati-activity.title: Enhancing the Resilience of the Agricultural Sector and Coastal Areas to Protect Livelihoods and Improve Food Security
iati-activity.description: To protect livelihoods and food security in vulnerable communities by: improving land and water management for the agricultural sector, strengthening coastal protection and building institutional and local capacity for climate change adaptation.

location.name: Negril; Northern Manchester province; South Clarendon and Rio Minho Watershed; Trelawny, St. Mary, St. Ann, St. Thomas

iati-activity.title: Climate Smart Agriculture: Enhancing Adaptive Capacity of the Rural Communities in Lebanon (AgriCAL)
iati-activity.description: To support the implementation of climate change adaptation measures in the agriculture sector in three highly vulnerable focus areas.

location.name: Akkar-Dannieh, North Baalbeck and Hermel, South regions and Lower Litani

iati-activity.title: Enhancing Resilience of Communities to the Adverse Effects of Climate Change on Food Security in Mauritania
iati-activity.description: To enhance the resilience of vulnerable communities to the effects of climate change on food security by (a) strengthening government services to support communities in their participative development and implementation of local adaptation and natural resource management plans; and (b) mobilize communities to invest in resilience and climate change adaptation to combat desertification, soil erosion and land degradation

location.name: Trarza, Brakna, Gorgol, Tagant, Assaba, Gudimaka, Hodh El Gharbi, Hodh El Chargui

iati-activity.title: Enhancing adaptive capacity of communities to climate change-related floods in the North Coast and Islands Region of Papua New Guinea
iati-activity.description: Strengthened ability of coastal and riverine communities in PNG to make informed decisions about and to undertake concrete actions to adapt to climate change-driven hazards affecting their specific locations.

location.name: Northern coastal regions,island provinces, River communities in the North Coast Region

iati-activity.title: Developing Climate Resilient Flood and Flash Flood Management Practices to Protect Vulnerable Communities of Georgia
iati-activity.description: To improve resilience of highly exposed regions of Georgia to hydro-meteorological threats that are increasing in frequency and intensity as a result of climate change.

location.name: Rioni River basin. Municipalities: Lentekhi, Oni, Ambrolauri, Tskaltubo, Samtredia, Tsageri Tsageri

iati-activity.title: Implementation Of Concrete Adaptation Measures To Reduce Vulnerability Of Livelihood and Economy Of Coastal Communities In Tanzania
iati-activity.description: To reduce vulnerability of livelihoods, ecosystems, infrastructure and economy in Tanzania.

location.name: Ilala and Temeke Districts (Dar Es Salaam region)

iati-activity.title: Strengthening the Resilience of our Islands and our Communities to Climate Change
iati-activity.description: To strengthen the ability of all Cook Island communities, and the public service, to make informed decisions and manage anticipated climate change driven pressures (including extreme events) in a pro-active, integrated and strategic manner.

location.name: Atiu (Enua Manu or Island of Birds), Ma'uke (Akatokamanava), Mitiaro (Nukuroa),Takutea, Manihiki (Te Fuinga o Niva), Nassau (Te Nuku o Ngalewu ), Penrhyn Island (Tongareva or Mangarongaro), Pukapuka (Te Ulu o te Watu), Rakahanga (Tapuahua), Aitutaki, Palmerson

iati-activity.title: Helping Small Farmers Adapt to Climate Change
iati-activity.description: Reduced vulnerability and increased resilience to CC and variability in small farms engaged in livestock production located in extremely drought sensitive Lus. Strengthened local capacity for adapting to CC and variability and for responding to extreme events (particularly severe droughts).

location.name: Basaltic Cuesta and East Hills

iati-activity.title: Enhancing Resilience of Samoa's Coastal Communities to Climate Change
iati-activity.description: Strengthened ability of coastal communities to to make informed decisions about climate-change induced hazards and undertake concrete adaptation actions

location.name: Samoa

iati-activity.title: Promoting Climate Resilience in the Rice Sector
iati-activity.description: To initiate the transformation of the rice sub-sector to make it more resilient to current climate variability as well as expected climate change and associated hazards.

location.name: Ambatondrazaka district, Andilamena district, Amparafaravola district

iati-activity.title: Climate Change Adaptation Programme in the Coastal Zone of Mauritius
iati-activity.description: To increase climate resilience of communities and livelihoods in coastal areas in Mauritius (all islands).

location.name: Mon Choisy, Quartre Soeurs, Riviere des Galets

iati-activity.title: Ecosystem Based Adaptation Approach to Maintaining Water Security in Critical Water Catchments in Mongolia
iati-activity.description: To maintain the water provisioning services supplied by mountain and steppe ecosystems by internalizing climate change risks within land and water resource management regimes

location.name: Altai Mountain/Great Lakes Basin and the Eastern Steppe

iati-activity.title: Increasing climate resilience through an Integrated Water Resource Management Programme in HA. Ihavandhoo, ADh. Mahibadhoo and GDh. Gadhdhoo Island
iati-activity.description: To ensure reliable and safe freshwater supply for Maldivian communities in a changing climate.

location.name: HA. Ihavandhoo, ADh. Mahibadhoo and GDh. Gadhdhoo Island

iati-activity.title: Addressing climate change risks to farming systems in Turkmenistan at national and community level
iati-activity.description: To strengthen water management practices at national and local levels in the context of climate change risks induced water scarcity to farming systems in Turkmenistan.

location.name: Nohur (Mountainous), Karakum (desert), and Sakar Chaga (Oasis), Yerbent region

iati-activity.title: Enhancing resilience of communities to the adverse effects of climate change on food security, in Pichincha Province and the Jubones River basin
iati-activity.description: Reduce vulnerability and food insecurity of communities and ecosystems, related to the adverse effects of climate change, in the most vulnerable cantons of Pichincha Province and the basin of the river Jubones.

location.name: Pichincha, Azuay, Loja and El Oro Provinces

iati-activity.title: Climate Change Adaptation Programme In Water and Agriculture In Anseba Region, Eritrea
iati-activity.description: Increase community resilience and adaptive capacity to climate change through an integrated water management and agricultural development approach in the sub-zobas of Hamelmalo and Habero, Anseba Region

location.name: Sub-zoba Hamelmalo & Sub zoba Habero, Zoba Anseba (Keren town is capital of Anseba region)

iati-activity.title: Enhancing resilience of communities in Solomon Islands to the adverse effects of climate change in agriculture and food security
iati-activity.description: Increased level of resilience of community-based food production systems in the agriculture sector in Solomon Islands against hazards and risks related to climate variability and climate change.

location.name: North Malaita (Malaita Province), Central Maringe (Isabel Province), Honiara city, South Choiseul in Choiseul Province, South Makira (Makira and Ulawa Province), South Guadalcanal (Guadalcanal Province), Lau & Langalanga Lagoon

iati-activity.title: Reduction of Risks and Vulnerability Based on Flooding and Droughts in the Estero Real River Watershed
iati-activity.description: Reduce the risks from droughts and flooding generated by climate change and variability in the watershed of the Estero Real river.

location.name: Villanueva, El Sauce, Achuapa municipality

iati-activity.title: Reducing Risks and Vulnerabilities from Glacier Lake Outburst Floods in Northern Pakistan
iati-activity.description: Reduce climate change-induced risks of Glacial Lake Outburst Floods (GLOFs) in Gilgit Baltistan and Chitral

location.name: Bagrot valley in Gilgit-Baltistan; Drongagh in Chitral

iati-activity.title: Adaptation to Coastal Erosion in Vulnerable Areas
iati-activity.description: To contribute to the implementation of Senegal's National Adaptation Plan of Action on Climate Change (NAPA).

location.name: Rufisque, Saly, and Joal

iati-activity.title: Addressing Climate Change Risks on Water Resources in Honduras: Increased Systemic Resilience and Reduced Vulnerability of the Urban Poor
iati-activity.description: Increase resilience to climate change water-related risks in the most vulnerable population in Honduras through pilot activities and an overarching intervention to mainstream climate change considerations into the water sector.

location.name: Tegucigalpa City, upper Choluteca basin

iati-activity.title: Addressing Climate Change Impacts on Marginalized Agricultural Communities Living in the Mahaweli River Basin of Sri Lanka
iati-activity.description: To mitigate effects of climate change induced rainfall variability and its impacts on livelihood and food security in rainfed farming communities in three sub watersheds of the Mahaweli River Basin.

location.name: Medirigiriya, Walapane

iati-activity.title: Increasing Climate Resilience and Enhancing Sustainable Land Management in the Southwest of the Buenos Aires Province
iati-activity.description: Contribute to reducing climate and man-made vulnerability of the agroecosystems in the Southwest of the Buenos Aires Province by increasing adaptive capacity of key local institutions and actors and piloting and disseminating climate resilient and sustainable land management practices.

location.name: Puán, Villarino, Patagones

iati-activity.title: Enhancing the Adaptive Capacity and Increasing Resilience of Small-size Agriculture Producers of the Northeast of Argentina
iati-activity.description: Increase the adaptive capacity and to build resilience of small-scale family agricultural producers in the face of climate change and climate variability impacts, particularly those deriving from the increase in the intensity of hydrometeorological events, such as floods and droughts.

location.name: Chaco, Northen Sante Fe, Corrientes, Santiago Del Estero

iati-activity.title: Climate change resilient production landscapes and socioeconomic networks advanced in Guatemal
iati-activity.description: Increase climate resilience of production landscapes and socio-economic systems in the target municipalities threatened by the impacts of climate change and climatic variability, in particular hydrometeorological events that are increasing in frequency and intensity.

location.name: Solola and Suchitepequez municipalities

iati-activity.title: Reducing Vulnerability to Climate Change in North West Rwanda through Community based adaptation.
iati-activity.description: Increase the adaptive capacity of natural

location.name: Nyabihu and Musanze districits
